item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded:
The Marcella, right center:

Looking south, 1936 (USC Digital Archives). Skinny building to the east of Marcella is the Winton Apts at 219 S Flower; bottom left is 208 S Figueroa (seen below, Cal State Library, William Reagh). The big building at top is the Stanley, southeast corner Second and Flower.
